          <a href="http://instagram.com/findinghome_LP" target="_blank">
           
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="social-email">
          <a href="mailto:laura@findinghomeonline.com" target="_blank">
           
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="social-pinterest">
          <a href="http://pinterest.com/findinghome/" target="_blank">
           
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="social-facebook">
          <a href="http://www.facebook.com/pages/Finding-Home/146356065397195" target="_blank">
           
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="social-twitter">
          <a href="http://twitter.com/FindingHome_LP" target="_blank">
           
          </a>
         </li>
         <li class="social-gplus">
          <a href="https://plus.google.com/u/0/115243092781094417279" target="_blank">
           
          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>
       </div>
      </section>
     </div>
     <div class="right-header">
      <section class="widget-1 widget-first widget-last widget-odd widget widget_search" id="search-4">
       <div class="widget-1 widget-first widget-last widget-odd widget-wrap">
        <form action="http://findinghomeonline.com/" class="search-form" method="get" role="search">
         <input name="s" placeholder="search here.." type="search"/>
         <input type="submit" value="Search"/>
        </form>
       </div>
      </section>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
   <nav class="nav-primary" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/SiteNavigationElement" role="navigation">

       </a>

          Find Me Here

        <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-9285" id="menu-item-9285">

          Advertise
         </a>
        </li>
        <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-post_type menu-item-object-page menu-item-9286" id="menu-item-9286">

         </a>
        </li>

      <li class="menu-item menu-item-type-taxonomy menu-item-object-category menu-item-17392" id="menu-item-17392">

       </a>

       </a>
      </li>

       </a>

   <div class="site-inner">
    <div class="content-sidebar-wrap">
     <main class="content" itemprop="mainContentOfPage" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Blog" role="main">
      <article class="post-12383 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-christmas category-holidays category-projects tag-wood-slice tag-wreath entry" itemprop="blogPost" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">
       <header class="entry-header">
        <h1 class="entry-title" itemprop="headline">
         Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath
        </h1>
        <p class="entry-meta">
         <time class="entry-time" datetime="2013-11-10T19:13:34+00:00" itemprop="datePublished">
          11/10/2013
         </time>
         <span class="entry-author" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
          by:
          <span class="entry-author-name" itemprop="name">
           Finding Home
          </span>
         </span>
        </p>
       </header>
       <div class="entry-content" itemprop="text">
        <input class="jpibfi" type="hidden"/>
        <div class="share-before share-filled share-small" id="share-before-12383">
         <div class="pinterest" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Pin" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="pinterest-before-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="facebook" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="facebook-before-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="googlePlus" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="googleplus-before-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="twitter" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Tweet" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="twitter-before-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="linkedin" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="linkedin-before-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="stumbleupon" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="stumbleupon-before-12383">
         </div>
        </div>
        <script type="text/javascript">
         jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
					$('#pinterest-before-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    pinterest: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  pinterest: { media: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WoodSliceChristmasWreath.jpg', description: 'Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath' } },
										  click: function(api, options){
										    api.simulateClick();
										    api.openPopup('pinterest');
										  }
										});
$('#facebook-before-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    facebook: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  },
										  click: function(api, options){
										    api.simulateClick();
										    api.openPopup('facebook');
										  }
										});
$('#googleplus-before-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    googlePlus: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  },
										  click: function(api, options){
										    api.simulateClick();
										    api.openPopup('googlePlus');
										  }
										});
$('#twitter-before-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    twitter: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  },
										  click: function(api, options){
										    api.simulateClick();
										    api.openPopup('twitter');
										  }
										});
$('#linkedin-before-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    linkedin: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  },
										  click: function(api, options){
										    api.simulateClick();
										    api.openPopup('linkedin');
										  }
										});
$('#stumbleupon-before-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    stumbleupon: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  },
										  click: function(api, options){
										    api.simulateClick();
										    api.openPopup('stumbleupon');
										  }
										});

				});
        </script>
        <p align="center">
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WoodSliceandBurlapChristmasWreathcopy.png">
          <img alt="Wood-Slice-and-Burlap-Christmas-Wreath copy" border="0" data-jpibfi-description="" height="930" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WoodSliceandBurlapChristmasWreathcopy_thumb.png" style="float: none; margin-left: auto; display: block; margin-right: auto; border: 0px;" title="Wood-Slice-and-Burlap-Christmas-Wreath copy" width="620"/>
         </a>
        </p>
        <p>
        </p>
        <center>
         <a data-pin-config="none" data-pin-do="buttonPin" href="//www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath%2F&amp;media=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2013%2F11%2FWoodSliceandBurlapChristmasWreathcopy.png&amp;description=Christmas%20Wreath%20-%20Wood%20Slice%20%26%20Burlap%20Christmas%20wreath">
          <img alt="" data-jpibfi-description="" src="//assets.pinterest.com/images/pidgets/pin_it_button.png"/>
         </a>
        </center>
        <p align="center">
         Here it is  my first official Christmas post and it is a Christmas Wreath!
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         Now, if this upsets you and you feel I should wait till Thanksgiving, my apologies. But as a blogger, like in magazines, if we wait that long, the pressure is on for everything else and the crafting gets left behind.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         And plus, I love to start Christmas early!
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         This wreath is a Christmas version of the
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-burlap-natural-fall-wreath/" target="_blank">
          Wood &amp; Burlap Fall Wreath
         </a>
         I shared a few weeks back.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         This wreath can be customized to whatever colors and patterns you like. It is pretty simple, here at the steps.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         <span id="more-12383">
         </span>
        </p>
        <h1 align="center">
         Step 1
        </h1>
        <p align="center">
         You simply start with a wreath form. I used
         <a href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00C1IMCSW/ref=as_li_qf_sp_asin_il_tl?ie=UTF8&amp;camp=1789&amp;creative=9325&amp;creativeASIN=B00C1IMCSW&amp;linkCode=as2&amp;tag=findhome0c-20&amp;linkId=JXUULJCRUSNVYVDM" target="_blank">
          a flat wooden form like this one
         </a>
         , but almost any one will work. It is a 12 wreath.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         We sliced the wood from logs we had with a chop saw. The slices were between 2.5 and 3 each. However, rumor has it that Michaels Stores are now selling the slices in a bag.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         Layer them around once and then a second time overlapping the seams of the first round.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         If your wreath is going indoors, you can use hot glue, but if you are putting it in a warm or sunny spot, use a weather safe adhesive.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         Tie a ribbon around the form for hangining before you beginning gluing the wood on.
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/ChristmasWreathTutorial.jpg">
          <img alt="Christmas-Wreath-Tutorial" border="0" data-jpibfi-description="" height="440" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/ChristmasWreathTutorial_thumb.jpg" style="float: none; margin-left: auto; display: block; margin-right: auto; border: 0px;" title="Christmas-Wreath-Tutorial" width="660"/>
         </a>
        </p>
        <h1 align="center">
         Step 2
        </h1>
        <p align="center">
         Fold over pieces of burlap ribbon, and glue them down in multiple directions to create a framework to build on. I also followed back in with the sheer snowflake ribbon for a little more pattern.
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WinterWreath.jpg">
          <img alt="Winter-Wreath" border="0" data-jpibfi-description="" height="440" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WinterWreath_thumb.jpg" style="float: none; margin-left: auto; display: block; margin-right: auto; border: 0px;" title="Winter-Wreath" width="660"/>
         </a>
        </p>
        <h1 align="center">
         Step 3
        </h1>
        <p align="center">
         Glue on pinecones in multiple sizes and directions.
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WoodSliceWinterWreath.jpg">
          <img alt="Wood-Slice-Winter-Wreath" border="0" data-jpibfi-description="" height="768" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WoodSliceWinterWreath_thumb.jpg" style="float: none; margin-left: auto; display: block; margin-right: auto; border: 0px;" title="Wood-Slice-Winter-Wreath" width="512"/>
         </a>
        </p>
        <h1 align="center">
         Step 4
        </h1>
        <p align="center">
         Using glue, tuck in varying pieces of imitation or real greenery. I used a green one with blue berries and then went back in to layer in the green berries.
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/BurlapRibbonChristmasWreath.jpg">
          <img alt="Burlap-Ribbon-Christmas-Wreath" border="0" data-jpibfi-description="" height="440" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/BurlapRibbonChristmasWreath_thumb.jpg" style="float: none; margin-left: auto; display: block; margin-right: auto; border: 0px;" title="Burlap-Ribbon-Christmas-Wreath" width="660"/>
         </a>
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         And then hang it up and enjoy!
        </p>
        <p>
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WoodSliceChristmasWreath.jpg">
          <img alt="Wood-Slice-Christmas-Wreath" border="0" data-jpibfi-description="" height="440" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/11/WoodSliceChristmasWreath_thumb.jpg" style="float: none; margin-left: auto; display: block; margin-right: auto; border: 0px;" title="Wood-Slice-Christmas-Wreath" width="660"/>
         </a>
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         Thanks so much for reading and happy crafting!
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         Update  I am proud to report that this wreath was photographed by BHG Christmas Crafts magazine for their 2014 edition.
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         <a href="http://shop.findinghomeonline.com" target="_blank">
          <img alt="Shop-Button_edited-1" class="size-full wp-image-16413 aligncenter" data-jpibfi-description="" height="310" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Shop-Button_edited-1.jpg" width="650"/>
         </a>
        </p>
        <p align="center">
         <a href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/postsignature.png">
          <img alt="postsignature.png" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-5694" data-jpibfi-description="" height="64" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/postsignature.png" width="268"/>
         </a>
         <em>
          Disclosure: Affiliate link included for the wreath forms
         </em>
        </p>
        <div class="linkwithin_hook" id="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/">
        </div>
        <script>
         &lt;!-- //LinkWithinCodeStart
var linkwithin_site_id = 568305;
var linkwithin_div_class = "linkwithin_hook";
//LinkWithinCodeEnd --&gt;
        </script>
        <script src="http://www.linkwithin.com/widget.js">
        </script>
        <a href="http://www.linkwithin.com/">
         <img alt="Related Posts Plugin for WordPress, Blogger..." data-jpibfi-description="" src="http://www.linkwithin.com/pixel.png" style="border: 0"/>
        </a>
        <div class="share-after share-filled share-small" id="share-after-12383">
         <div class="pinterest" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Pin" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="pinterest-after-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="facebook" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="facebook-after-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="googlePlus" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="googleplus-after-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="twitter" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Tweet" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="twitter-after-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="linkedin" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="linkedin-after-12383">
         </div>
         <div class="stumbleupon" data-text="Wood slice &amp; Burlap Christmas Wreath" data-title="Share" data-url="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/" data-urlalt="http://wp.me/p2CBGh-3dJ" id="stumbleupon-after-12383">
         </div>
        </div>
        <script type="text/javascript">
         jQuery(document).ready(function($) {

										  share: {

										});

										  share: {
										    googlePlus: true

										  }
										});
$('#twitter-after-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    twitter: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',

										  buttons: {  },

										    api.openPopup('twitter');
										  }
										});
$('#linkedin-after-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    linkedin: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  },
										  click: function(api, options){

										    api.openPopup('linkedin');

$('#stumbleupon-after-12383').sharrre({
										  share: {
										    stumbleupon: true
										  },
										  urlCurl: 'http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-content/plugins/genesis-simple-share/lib/sharrre/sharrre.php',
										  enableHover: false,
										  enableTracking: true,
										  buttons: {  },
										  click: function(api, options){
										    api.simulateClick();
										    api.openPopup('stumbleupon');
										  }
										});

				});
        </script>
       </div>
       <footer class="entry-footer">
        <p class="entry-meta">
        </p>
        <center>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          var googletag = googletag || {};
  googletag.cmd = googletag.cmd || [];
  (function() {
    var gads = document.createElement('script');
    gads.async = true;
    gads.type = 'text/javascript';
    var useSSL = 'https:' == document.location.protocol;
    gads.src = (useSSL ? 'https:' : 'http:') +
      '//www.googletagservices.com/tag/js/gpt.js';
    var node = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    node.parentNode.insertBefore(gads, node);
  })();
         </script>
         <script type="text/javascript">
          googletag.cmd.push(function() {
    googletag.defineSlot('/107373944/FindingHomeOnline_Native', [[500, 350], [500, 250], [1, 1], [300, 250]], 'div-gpt-ad-1432050991429-0').addService(googletag.pubads());
    googletag.enableServices();
  });
         </script>
         <!-- /107373944/FindingHomeOnline_Native -->
         <div id="div-gpt-ad-1432050991429-0">
          <script type="text/javascript">
           googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1432050991429-0'); });
          </script>
         </div>
        </center>
       </footer>
      </article>
      <div class="after-entry widget-area">
       <section class="widget-1 widget-first widget-last widget-odd widget widget_text" id="text-97">
        <div class="widget-1 widget-first widget-last widget-odd widget-wrap">
         <h4 class="widget-title widgettitle">
          Subscribe to Our Posts &amp; Updates
         </h4>
         <div class="textwidget">
          <center>
           <iframe frameborder="0" height="347" scrolling="no" src="https://madmimi.com/signups/108573/iframe" style="max-width: 400px; width: 100%;">
           </iframe>
          </center>
         </div>
        </div>
       </section>
      </div>
      <section class="author-box" itemprop="author" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
       <img alt="" class="avatar avatar-70 photo" height="70" src="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/5e3b015155be61522ce374e2dc8dbfb4?s=70&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g" srcset="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/5e3b015155be61522ce374e2dc8dbfb4?s=140&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g 2x" width="70"/>
       <h4 class="author-box-title">
        About
        <span itemprop="name">
         Finding Home
        </span>
       </h4>
       <div class="author-box-content" itemprop="description">
        <p>
         Welcome to Finding Home where we share our favorite DIY and decorating ideas and inspiration.  We believe your home should be a reflection of you and your family.  Our blog is the story of our journey - and what we find along the way.  Thanks for joining us!
        </p>
       </div>
      </section>
      <style type="text/css">
       body .era_ad_block.thumbnail .vsw-search-box-container {display:none !important;}
body .era_ad_block.thumbnail .vsw-ad-item:hover .vsw-ad-domain {color:#988F81 !important;}
body .era_ad_block.thumbnail .vsw-ad-header {color:#958932 !important; text-transform:uppercase !important; font-family:'Open Sans Condensed',"Helvetica Neue",Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif !important; font-weight:normal !important; font-size:26px !important;}
body .era_ad_block.thumbnail .vsw-ad-item:hover .vsw-ad-title {font-size:12px !important; color: #988F81 !important;}
body .era_ad_block.thumbnail .vsw-ad-item .vsw-ad-title {font-size:12px !important;}
      </style>
      <!-- NTENT ADS -->
      <script language="JavaScript" type="text/javascript">
       var era_rc = {
   ERADomain: 'as.vs4homeandgarden.com',
   PubID: 'findinghomeonline',
   Layout: 'thumbnail',
   MaxRelatedItems: '4',
   BlockID: 'thumbnail',
   SearchWidgetPosition: '0',
   SearchBoxCaption: 'Find More ...',
   HeaderText: 'Marketplace Recommendations'
};
(function(){var v='ERA_AD_BLOCK';var i=1;while(document.getElementById(v)){if(i==25)break;v='ERA_AD_BLOCK'+i++;}document.write("&lt;"+"div id='"+v+"'&gt;&lt;"+"/div&gt;");
var sch=(location.protocol=='https:'?'https':'http');var host=sch=='http'?'as.ntent.com':'secure.ntent.com';var s=document.createElement('script');var src=sch+"://"+host+"/ERALinks/era_rl.aspx?elid="+v;for(var p in era_rc)
{if(era_rc.hasOwnProperty(p)){src+=decodeURIComponent('%26')+p.toLowerCase()+"="+encodeURIComponent(era_rc[p]);}};s.src=src;document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(s);})();
      </script>
      <!-- END NTENT ADS -->

        <li class="comment even thread-even depth-1" id="comment-146680">
         <article itemprop="comment" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/UserComments">
          <header class="comment-header">
           <p class="comment-author" itemprop="creator" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            <img alt="" class="avatar avatar-48 photo" height="48" src="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/8b325b05f7234ce6bc31c7b4dc121925?s=48&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g" srcset="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/8b325b05f7234ce6bc31c7b4dc121925?s=96&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g 2x" width="48"/>

              kristen pare
             </a>
            </span>
            <span class="says">
             says
            </span>
           </p>
           <p class="comment-meta">
            <time class="comment-time" datetime="2013-11-11T06:48:42+00:00" itemprop="commentTime">
             <a class="comment-time-link" href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/#comment-146680" itemprop="url">
              11/11/2013 at 6:48 am
             </a>
            </time>
           </p>
          </header>
          <div class="comment-content" itemprop="commentText">
           <p>
            Love the wreath! and the pretty green colors used.  Being a business, you need to start the inspiration early!  I have been busy since August shooting Christmas goods.  This year the Season will be a bit shorter since Thanksgiving is not till the 28th.  BTW, Little one and I went to a Mother/Daughter workshop on Saturday and made shabby sweet wreath and on the wayseveral houses already were fully decked with lights and all.  Tis the season
            <img alt=":)" class="wp-smiley" src="http://findinghomeonline.com/wp-includes/images/smilies/simple-smile.png" style="height: 1em; max-height: 1em;"/>
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="comment-reply">
           <a aria-label="Reply to kristen pare" class="comment-reply-link" href="/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/?replytocom=146680#respond" onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-146680", "146680", "respond", "12383" )'>
            Reply
           </a>
          </div>
         </article>
        </li>
        <!-- #comment-## -->

        <li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="comment-148847">
         <article itemprop="comment" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/UserComments">
          <header class="comment-header">
           <p class="comment-author" itemprop="creator" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            <img alt="" class="avatar avatar-48 photo" height="48" src="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/b04ea9ebedb9cd0cd8e2da8d23b77f90?s=48&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g" srcset="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/b04ea9ebedb9cd0cd8e2da8d23b77f90?s=96&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g 2x" width="48"/>

             <a class="comment-author-link" href="http://www.the36thavenue.com" itemprop="url" rel="external nofollow">
              Desiree @ The36thAvenue
             </a>
            </span>
            <span class="says">

           </p>
           <p class="comment-meta">
            <time class="comment-time" datetime="2013-11-16T00:38:47+00:00" itemprop="commentTime">
             <a class="comment-time-link" href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/#comment-148847" itemprop="url">
              11/16/2013 at 12:38 am
             </a>
            </time>
           </p>
          </header>
          <div class="comment-content" itemprop="commentText">
           <p>
            Super cute! Thank you so much for linking up to our party I am featuring you tomorrow!
           </p>
          </div>

        <li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="comment-153416">
         <article itemprop="comment" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/UserComments">
          <header class="comment-header">
           <p class="comment-author" itemprop="creator" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            <img alt="" class="avatar avatar-48 photo" height="48" src="http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/f4b9114d9a7bbea7d85503366647ae52?s=48&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g" srcset="http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/f4b9114d9a7bbea7d85503366647ae52?s=96&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g 2x" width="48"/>
            <span itemprop="name">
             Katy D
            </span>
            <span class="says">
             says
            </span>
           </p>
           <p class="comment-meta">
            <time class="comment-time" datetime="2013-11-24T16:40:14+00:00" itemprop="commentTime">
             <a class="comment-time-link" href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/#comment-153416" itemprop="url">
              11/24/2013 at 4:40 pm
             </a>
            </time>
           </p>
          </header>
          <div class="comment-content" itemprop="commentText">
           <p>
            Hello!
            <br/>
            I love this wreath!  I would really like to make something like this.  My husband and I heat our home primarily with wood in the winter so we have no shortage of wood I could use for this.  I would probably end up using slices of birch.  I am wondering, did you coat them with anything to keep them from drying out and cracking? Also, did you sand them or did your saw do a good enough job keeping them smooth?  Any extra tips regarding your cutting process would be appreciated!!
           </p>
           <p>
            Thank you,
            <br/>
            Katy
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="comment-reply">
           <a aria-label="Reply to Katy D" class="comment-reply-link" href="/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/?replytocom=153416#respond" onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-153416", "153416", "respond", "12383" )'>
            Reply
           </a>
          </div>
         </article>
        </li>

        </li>
        <!-- #comment-## -->
        <li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="comment-420817">
         <article itemprop="comment" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/UserComments">
          <header class="comment-header">
           <p class="comment-author" itemprop="creator" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            <img alt="" class="avatar avatar-48 photo" height="48" src="http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/dc383df15e3249e53b23ed984061264f?s=48&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g" srcset="http://1.gravatar.com/avatar/dc383df15e3249e53b23ed984061264f?s=96&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g 2x" width="48"/>
            <span itemprop="name">
             <a class="comment-author-link" href="http://www.handsonessays.com" itemprop="url" rel="external nofollow">
              Bonita
             </a>
            </span>
            <span class="says">
             says
            </span>
           </p>
           <p class="comment-meta">
            <time class="comment-time" datetime="2014-12-02T21:42:01+00:00" itemprop="commentTime">
             <a class="comment-time-link" href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/#comment-420817" itemprop="url">
              12/02/2014 at 9:42 pm
             </a>
            </time>
           </p>
          </header>
          <div class="comment-content" itemprop="commentText">
           <p>
            Love the simple woodsy feel! I think natural, non-flashy decorations are the prettiest.
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="comment-reply">
           <a aria-label="Reply to Bonita" class="comment-reply-link" href="/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/?replytocom=420817#respond" onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-420817", "420817", "respond", "12383" )'>
            Reply
           </a>
          </div>
         </article>
        </li>
        <!-- #comment-## -->
        <li class="comment even thread-even depth-1" id="comment-429334">
         <article itemprop="comment" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/UserComments">
          <header class="comment-header">
           <p class="comment-author" itemprop="creator" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            <img alt="" class="avatar avatar-48 photo" height="48" src="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/edec33ac4ac4d72db774519270ae87b0?s=48&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g" srcset="http://2.gravatar.com/avatar/edec33ac4ac4d72db774519270ae87b0?s=96&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g 2x" width="48"/>
            <span itemprop="name">
             Dondi
            </span>
            <span class="says">
             says
            </span>
           </p>
           <p class="comment-meta">
            <time class="comment-time" datetime="2014-12-13T20:52:27+00:00" itemprop="commentTime">
             <a class="comment-time-link" href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/#comment-429334" itemprop="url">
              12/13/2014 at 8:52 pm
             </a>
            </time>
           </p>
          </header>
          <div class="comment-content" itemprop="commentText">
           <p>
            Love this! Making it for a friend and cant wait to give it to her! Can anyone tell me what the green berries are? Are they real or artificial? TIA
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="comment-reply">
           <a aria-label="Reply to Dondi" class="comment-reply-link" href="/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/?replytocom=429334#respond" onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-429334", "429334", "respond", "12383" )'>

           </a>

         </article>
        </li>
        <!-- #comment-## -->
        <li class="comment odd alt thread-odd thread-alt depth-1" id="comment-454194">
         <article itemprop="comment" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/UserComments">
          <header class="comment-header">
           <p class="comment-author" itemprop="creator" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person">
            <img alt="" class="avatar avatar-48 photo" height="48" src="http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/c442e760d34e68795b64cd5d17ac78da?s=48&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g" srcset="http://0.gravatar.com/avatar/c442e760d34e68795b64cd5d17ac78da?s=96&amp;d=http%3A%2F%2Ffindinghomeonline.com%2Fwp-content%2Fthemes%2Ffun%2Fimages%2Favatar.png&amp;r=g 2x" width="48"/>
            <span itemprop="name">
             Mary
            </span>
            <span class="says">
             says
            </span>
           </p>
           <p class="comment-meta">
            <time class="comment-time" datetime="2015-01-05T19:44:26+00:00" itemprop="commentTime">
             <a class="comment-time-link" href="http://findinghomeonline.com/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/#comment-454194" itemprop="url">
              01/05/2015 at 7:44 pm
             </a>
            </time>
           </p>
          </header>
          <div class="comment-content" itemprop="commentText">
           <p>
            My husband and I have been saving the bottom slice from our Christmas trees for years and Ive never known quite what to do with them other than to collect them in a basket.  (We did send a couple to our daughter while she was deployed overseas.)  Ill have to check to see if I have enough to make two wreaths  one for our son and one for our daughter.   I believe its something they would treasure.  Thanks!
           </p>
          </div>
          <div class="comment-reply">
           <a aria-label="Reply to Mary" class="comment-reply-link" href="/wood-slice-burlap-christmas-wreath/?replytocom=454194#respond" onclick='return addComment.moveForm( "comment-454194", "454194", "respond", "12383" )'>
            Reply
           </a>
          </div>
         </article>
        </li>
        <!-- #comment-## -->
       </ol>
      </div>
      <img src="http://blogtest.creativekristi.com/wp-content/uploads/double-dividerFHO.png"/>
     </main>

           <div class="sbtw widget_categories" id="categories-3">
            <h2 class="widgettitle widget_title">
             Categories
            </h2>
            <label class="screen-reader-text" for="cat">
             Categories
            </label>
            <select class="postform" id="cat" name="cat">
             <option value="-1">
              Select Category
             </option>

              Upcycling &amp; Repurposed
             </option>
            </select>
            <script type="text/javascript">
             /* &lt;![CDATA[ */
(function() {
	var dropdown = document.getElementById( "cat" );
	function onCatChange() {
		if ( dropdown.options[ dropdown.selectedIndex ].value &gt; 0 ) {
			location.href = "http://findinghomeonline.com/?cat=" + dropdown.options[ dropdown.selectedIndex ].value;
		}
	}
	dropdown.onchange = onCatChange;
})();
/* ]]&gt; */
            </script>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>

       /* &lt;![CDATA[ */

      jQuery("ul.sidebarTabs1").tabs("div.sidebarTabs_divs1 &gt; .tb", {
							    initialIndex: 0
					   });		
   });
/* ]]&gt; */
      </script>

         <div id="div-gpt-ad-1422589871332-6" style="width:160px; height:600px; float:right; position:relative; right:15px;">
          <script type="text/javascript">
           ybotq.push(function () {
googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1422589871332-6'); });
});
          </script>
         </div>
         <!-- FindingHome_Sidebar_5_160x600 -->
         <div id="div-gpt-ad-1422589871332-7" style="width:160px; height:600px; float:left position:relative; left:15px;">
          <script type="text/javascript">
           ybotq.push(function () {
googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('div-gpt-ad-1422589871332-7'); });
});
          </script>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </section>
      <section class="widget-12 widget-even widget featuredpost" id="featured-post-14">
